job.title: Software Engineer, Proactive Intelligence Platform
job.description: ltbrgtltstronggtSummaryltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtBooked a flight and it was magically added to your calendar Made dinner plans in Messages and got a suggestion to turn on Do Not Disturb before the event Tried to share a photo and saw the right person suggested just a tap away The vision for the Proactive Intelligence organization is to improve Apple platforms by better understanding anticipating and adapting to user behavior by using machine learning to build great predictive features right into Apple products used by billions of users worldwideltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtKey Qualificationsltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtAbility to write reliable resilient performant and welltested codeltbrgtltbrgtGood foundation in software design and architectureltbrgtltbrgtPrior experience in systems using various data store technologies blob NoSQL and relationalltbrgtltbrgtOutstanding communication and presentation skills and an appetite to drive strong multifunctional collaborationltbrgtltbrgtDevelopment experience with macOSiOS using ObjectiveC or Swift is a plusltbrgtltbrgtExperience in ML or Applied Statistics is a plusltbrgtltbrgtExperience with web development technologies and scripting languages is a plusltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtDescriptionltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtWe are a growing talented and motivated team focused on building the platform that powers intelligent features across Apple products These features make users more efficient by predicting and accelerating the user experience while respecting privacy We collaborate with many different teams at Apple to build groundbreaking technology We will consider candidates with exceptional track records as well as candidates who are early in their careers and exhibit strong potential for growth If you love building sophisticated software systems taking on hard problems and you have a passion for data and data processing systems then you will enjoy this role ltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtTo succeed in this role you must be a strong programmer and a creative problem solver who thrives in a fastpaced environment working across teams and organizations You will touch various parts of our code base from optimizing memory and CPU usage to designing APIs from implementing efficient data structures and minimizing IO to designing solid testable architectures or concurrent systems You will be able to work on our full stack ranging from internal tools development to shipping code that runs on the devices you use every dayltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtEducation ampamp Experienceltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtBS MS or PhD in Computer Science Electrical Engineering or equivalentltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtRole Number 200269510ltbrgtltbrgt
